name: The Gifts of Three Gods
description: Enjoy this specially crafted 3D holiday-themed game to celebrate the 2021 Chinese Lunar New Year with your dear family and friends. Our main character - Ox  - will be eating a lot of traditional Chinese foods while receiving blessings from the three Gods - Fu (God of Fortune), Lu (God of Prosperity), and Shou (God of Longevity). Wishing you and your family a healthy and amazing 2021. Have fun and stay awesome!
